title: my second\_hand\_writing
content:
dear friends typophiles!

long-long time ago you help me so much  
with previous version with font,  
based on my handwriting.  
thank you again :)

shame for me,  
but i not finished that font  
and lost all data.  
so, after long time,  
i start to build new font with same idea.

here is a link on sample of latin part,  
very close to finish, to my taste.  
give me please any comments,  
thank you and sorry my english :)

[http://type.iatp.org.ua/zapf\_quote.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419035833/http:/type.iatp.org.ua/zapf_quote.gif "http://type.iatp.org.ua/zapf\_quote.gif")
author: andrijtype
